        public ResponseFuture<Address> getAddressDetails(@NonNull
                                                 GeocodingResult geocodingResult,
                                                 @Nullable
                                                 java.lang.String languageCode)
        Sends a request for the address data of the given GeocodingResult, in the given preferred language.
        Parameters:
        geocodingResult - The geocoding result whose address details to return
        languageCode - ISO 639-1 language code for the preferred language of the address
